text:
Question 21) A giant of the Internet industry, in symbolic gesture, changed the treatment it gave to its Palestinian page. The search site changed its page when accessed from the West Bank. Instead of “Palestinian territories”, the company now writes “Palestine” just below the logo.
BERCITO, D. Google changes Palestinian Territories. The symbolic gesture signaled by the change in the status of Palestinian territories means
A) emergence of a binational country.
B) Strengthening anti -Semitic movements.
C) emptying of Jewish settlements.
D) recognition of a legal authority.
E) establishment of national borders.
